articles.description: The contract was sold by a woman who worked in the music industry, ahead of her retirement.
articles.content:
image copyrightPaul Bergen/Redferns/Getty Images
image captionThe band also wanted "a good-quality, two-course hot meal"
An Oasis gig contract requesting "sober-speaking" helpers and "Quality lager… [+1553 chars]
